data.text: O Israel, se nya si Yehowa gblɔ tso mi ƒome blibo si wòkplɔ tso Egipte la ŋu ɖa.
“Le amegbetɔƒome siwo katã le anyigba dzi dome la,
elabena aleke ame eve ate ŋu
Ɖe dzata ɖea gbe le ave me
Ɖe xevi dzona ɖe mɔ dzi le anyigba,
Ne kpẽ ɖi le du me la,
Dzata ɖe gbe, ame kae mavɔ̃ o.
Yehowa be, “Nye dukɔ ŋlɔ nu nyui wɔwɔ be,
Aƒetɔ Yehowa, Dziƒoʋakɔwo ƒe Mawu la gblɔ be,
Gbe si gbe mahe to na Israel ɖe eƒe nu vɔ̃wo ta la,
